Address.label: Address
Address.value: 2187 ATLANTIC STREET, STAMFORD, Connecticut, 06902, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Information Services Group Inc is a US-based technology insight, market intelligence, and advisory services firm. It principally offers digital transformation services, such as automation and cloud & data analytics; managed governance; network carrier services; technology strategy & operations design; changes management; market intelligence & technology research and analysis. It operates in one segment, fact-based sourcing advisory services. Its geographical segments are the Americas, Europe, and Asia-pacific.
